Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Nee Un Janaththin Puththirarode Pesi, Avargalode Sollavendiyadhaavadhu: Naan Dhesaththinmel Pattayaththai Varappannugaiyil Dhesaththin Janam Thangal Ellaigalilulla Oruvanai Azhaiththu, Avanaith Thangalukkuk Kaavarkaaranaaga Vaiththapinbu,
3 ivan Dhesaththinmel Pattayam Varuvadhaikkandu, Ekkaalam Oodhi, Janaththai Echcharikkumpodhu,
4 ekkaalaththin Saththaththaik Ketkiravan Adhaik Kettum, Echcharikkaiyaayiraamal, Pattayam Vandhu Avanai Vaarikkollugiradhu Undaanaal, Avanudaiya Raththappazhi Avan Thalaiyinmel Sumarum.
5 avan Ekkaalaththin Saththaththaikkettum, Echcharikkaiyaayirukkavillai; Avanudaiya Raththappazhi Avanperile Sumarum; Echcharikkaiyaayirukkiravano Than Jeevanaith Thappuviththukkolluvaan.

6 kaavarkaaran Pattayam Varuvadhaik Kandum, Avan Ekkaalam Oodhaamalum Janangal Echcharikkappadaamalum, Pattayam Vandhu Avargalil Yaadhoruvanai Vaarikkollugiradhu Undaanaal, Avan Than Akkiramaththile Vaarikkollappattaan; Aanaalum Avan Raththappazhiyaik Kaavarkaaran Kaiyile Ketpen.
7 manupuththirane, Naan Unnai Isravel Vamsaththaarukkuk Kaavarkaaranaaga Vaiththen; Aagaiyaal Nee En Vaayinaale Vaarththaiyaikkettu, En Naamaththinaale Avargalai Echcharippaayaaga.

8 naan Dhunmaarkkanai Nokki: Dhunmaarkkane, Nee Saagave Saavaayendru Sollugaiyil, Nee Dhunmaarkkanaith Than Dhunmaarkkaththiliraadhapadi Echcharikkaththakkadhaaga Adhai Avanukku Sollaamarponaal, Andha Dhunmaarkkan Than Akkiramaththile Saavaan; Aanaalum Avan Raththappazhiyai Un Kaiyile Ketpen.
9 dhunmaarkkan Than Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbumpadi Nee Avanai Echchariththum, Avan Than Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbaamarponaal, Avan Than Akkiramaththile Saavaan; Neeyo Un Aaththumaavaith Thappuvippaai.
10 manupuththirane, Nee Isravel Vamsaththaarai Nokki: Engal Dhrogangalum Engal Paavangalum Engalmel Irukkiradhu, Naangal Sorndhupogirom, Naangal Pizhaippadhu Eppadiyendru Neengal Sollugireergal.

11 karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Dhunmaarkkanudaiya Maranaththai Virumbaamal, Dhunmaarkkan Than Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbip Pizhaippadhaiye Virumbugiren Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren; Isravel Vamsaththaare, Ungal Pollaadha Vazhigalaivittuth Thirumbungal, Thirumbungal; Neengal En Saagavendum Engiraar Endru Avargalode Sollu.

12 manupuththirane, Nee Un Janaththin Puththirarai Nokki: Needhimaan Dhrogampannugira Naalile Avanudaiya Needhi Avanaith Thappuvippadhillai; Dhunmaarkkan Than Dhunmaarkkaththaivittuth Thirumbugira Naalile Avan Than Akkiramaththinaal Vizhundhupovadhumillai; Needhimaan Paavancheygira Naalile Than Needhiyinaal Pizhaippadhumillai.

13 pizhaikkave Pizhaippaai Endru Naan Needhimaanukku Sollumpodhu, Avan Than Needhiyai Nambi, Aniyaayancheydhaal, Avanudaiya Needhiyil Ondrum Ninaikkappaduvadhillai, Avan Seydha Than Aniyaayaththile Saavaan.
14 pinnum Saagave Saavaai Endru Naan Dhunmaarkkanukku Sollumpodhu, Avan Than Paavaththaivittuth Thirumbi, Nyaayamum Needhiyuncheydhu,

15 dhunmaarkkan Thaan Vaangina Adaimaanaththaiyum Thaan Kollaiyitta Porulaiyum Thirumbakkoduththuvittu, Aniyaayam Seyyaadhapadi Jeevappramaanangalil Nadandhaal, Avan Saagaamal Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan.
16 avan Seydha Avanudaiya Ellaap Paavangalum Avanukku Virodhamaaga Ninaikkappaduvadhillai; Avan Nyaayamum Needhiyum Seydhaan, Pizhaikkave Pizhaippaan Endru Sollu.
17 un Janaththin Puththiraro, Aandavarudaiya Vazhi Semmaiyaanadhalla Engiraargal; Avargaludaiya Vazhiye Semmaiyaanadhalla.
18 needhimaan Than Needhiyaivittuth Thirumbi, Aniyaayancheydhaal, Avan Adhinaal Saavaan.
19 dhunmaarkkan Than Akkiramaththaivittuth Thirumbi, Nyaayamum Needhiyum Seydhaal, Avan Avaigalinaal Pizhaippaan.
20 neengalo, Aandavarudaiya Vazhi Semmaiyaanadhalla Engireergal, Isravel Veettaare, Naan Ungalil Ovvoruvanaiyum Avanavan Vazhigalinpadiye Nyaayantheerppenendru Sol Endraar.
21 engal Siraiyiruppin Pannirandaam Varusham Paththaam Maadham Aindhaanthedhiyile Erusalemilirundhu Thappina Oruvan Ennidaththil Vandhu: Nagaram Azhikkappattadhu Endraan.

22 thappinavan Varugiradharku Mundhina Saayankaalaththile Karththarudaiya Kai Enmel Amarndhu, Avan Kaalaiyil Ennidaththil Varumattum En Vaayaith Thirandhirukkappannitru; En Vaai Thirakkappattadhu, Pinbu Naan Mownamaayirukkavillai.
23 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

24 manupuththirane, Isravel Dhesaththin Paazhaana Idangalilulla Kudigal: Aabiragaam Oruvanaayirundhu, Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkondaan; Naangal Anegaraayirukkirom, Engalukku Indha Dhesam Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkappattadhu Endru Sollugiraargal.

25 aagaiyaal, Nee Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Raththaththode Koodiyadhaith Thindru, Ungal Naragalaana Vikkiragangalukku Neraaga Ungal Kangalai Ereduththu, Raththaththai Sindhiyirukkireergal, Neengal Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkolveergalo?

26 neengal Ungal Pattayaththai Nambikkondu, Aruvaruppaanadhai Seydhu, Ungalil Avanavan Thanthan Ayalaan Manaiviyaith Theettuppaduththugireergal; Neengal Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkolveergalo Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sollu.

27 nee Avargalai Nokki: Paazhaana Idangalil Irukkiravargal Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal; Veligalil Irukkiravanai Mirugangalukku Iraiyaaga Oppukkoduppen; Kottaigalilum Kebigalilum Irukkiravargal Kollainoyaal Saavaargal.
28 naan Dhesaththaip Paazhum Avaandharamumaakkuven; Appozhudhu Adhinudaiya Belaththin Perumai Ozhindhupogum; Appozhudhu Isravelin Malaigal Kadandhupovaarillaamal Avaandharamaaik Kidakkum.

29 avargal Seydha Avargaludaiya Ellaa Aruvaruppugalinimiththamum Naan Dhesaththaip Paazhum Avaandharamumaakkumpodhu Naan Karththarendru Arindhukolvaargal, Idhai En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sollu.

30 melum Manupuththirane, Un Janaththin Puththirar Suvar Orangalilum Veettuvaasalgalilum Unnaikkuriththup Pesi, Karththaridaththilirundhu Purappatta Vaarththai Ennavendru Ketpom Vaarungal Endru Oruvarodoruvarum Sagodharanode Sagodharanum Solli,

31 janangal Koodivarugira Vazhakkaththinpadi Unnidaththil Vandhu, Unakku Munbaaga En Janangalpol Utkaarndhu, Un Vaarththaigalaik Ketkiraargal; Aanaalum Avargal Avaigalinpadi Seygiradhillai; Avargal Thangal Vaayinaale Inbamaaip Pesugiraargal, Avargal Irudhayamo Porulaasaiyaip Pinpatrippogiradhu.

32 idho, Nee Iniya Kuralum Keedhavaaththiyam Vaasippadhil Saamarththiyamumudaiyavan Paadum Inbamaana Paattukku Samaanamaayirukkiraai; Avargal Un Vaarththaigalaik Ketkiraargal; Aanaalum Avaigalinpadi Seyyaamarpogiraargal.
33 idho, Adhu Varugiradhu, Adhu Varugaiyil Thangal Naduvile Oru Theerkkadharisi Irundhaan Endru Arindhukolvaargal Endraar.
